participant_1.name: Emily Johnson
participant_1.personality: Curious and energetic, Emily is always eager to learn new things and explore the world around her.
participant_1.background: I'm retired and living the great life. I've amazing children and grandchildren. I had cancer but it's gone now. I can sew my own clothes.

participant_2.name: Jake Thompson
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and sociable, Jake enjoys trying new foods and meeting new people during his travels.
participant_2.background: I have been trying all types of food everywhere I go. I have been traveling the world for years. I own a yacht and I rent it out when I am not using it. I also like to cook but I am not very good at it. Hey there, I'm 23 and I love food.

content.text: that s wonderful for your age   i have a great retired life for sure
howdy   i am fine   what do you do for a living
I am a student. I don't work
do you work   i m in school
how do you feel about retiring   do you like the job
how do you feel about retiring   do you like the job
I'm too young to be retired
i am older so i am now retired
great   what did you work and retire from
